titles.title: A resolution to commend the Tar Heels of the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill for winning the 1993 National Collegiate Athletic Association Men's Basketball Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/19/1993--Introduced. Commends the North Carolina University Tar Heels for winning the 1993 National Collegiate Athletic Association Men's Basketball Championship.
